description: As piSST, but with monthly-varying SSTs and sea ice taken from years 111-140 of each model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment instead of from piControl.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, SST pattern anomaly, sea ice anomaly, piSST, abrupt4xCO2, piControl
long_name: control plus warming pattern SSTs and SIC

requirements.description: Run for the 30 years corresponding to years 111-140 of the abrupt-4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: 1960-1989 30yrs

requirements.description: Monthly-varying sea surface temperature from years 111 to 140 of the abrupt-4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: abrupt-4xCO2 SST

requirements.description: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from years 111 to 140 of the abrupt4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: abrupt-4xCO2 SIC

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial solar particle forcing (1850-1873 mean). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Pre-Industrial, pi, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
